Articles.Content: With two keyboards plugged in, the tutorials will not recognize that you have pressed the WASD keys to control your rocket in flight. The rocket is still controllable in flight, but you cannot progress through the tutorial. Mitigation is simple, unplug one keyboard and you can progress through the tutorials. Posted on the discord forum, as well as submitted a report through private division (number 47358). Simply reposting here for awareness by the community.
